|===================================================
| Features                                 <| Location

| AVR32                                    <| Target options -> Target Architecture
| mips I (generic)                         <| Target options -> Target Architecture Variant
| mips II                                  <| Target options -> Target Architecture Variant
| mips III                                 <| Target options -> Target Architecture Variant
| mips IV                                  <| Target options -> Target Architecture Variant
| sstrip                                   <| Build options -> strip command for binaries on target
| Linux 3.0.x kernel headers               <| Toolchain -> Kernel Headers
| Linux 3.11.x kernel headers              <| Toolchain -> Kernel Headers
| Linux 3.13.x kernel headers              <| Toolchain -> Kernel Headers
| Linux 3.15.x kernel headers              <| Toolchain -> Kernel Headers
| Enable Objective-C support               <| Toolchain
| Enable Fortran support                   <| Toolchain
| Xilinx Little Endian Microblaze GNU Tools 14.3 <| Toolchain -> Toolchain
| Xilinx Little Endian Microblaze GNU Tools v2 <| Toolchain -> Toolchain
| Xilinx Big Endian Microblaze GNU Tools   <| Toolchain -> Toolchain
| Xilinx Big Endian Microblaze GNU Tools   <| Toolchain -> Toolchain
| bison                                    <| Target packages -> Development tools
| distcc                                   <| Target packages -> Development tools
| Install flex binary on target            <| Target packages -> Development tools
| m4                                       <| Target packages -> Development tools
| gob2                                     <| Target packages -> Graphic libraries and applications (graphic/text)
| blackbox                                 <| Target packages -> Graphic libraries and applications (graphic/text)
| v 0.8.x                                  <| Target packages -> Interpreter languages and scripting -> Haserl version
| Custom Network Settings                  <| Bootloaders

|===================================================
